title: my account maybe hacked
body: a person on my friends list sent me a message with a link and he wrote vote for my pentakill and u will get free skins or something like that i click on the link and it pops up a box where im supposed to login i logged in and Then when I was going to log in to my account i didnt work anyone know anything about this write a comment thank you

replies.body:
Ooooo not always a good idea to click on links you don't recognize or usually trust. These are most likely [**phishing websites**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204230720) designed to steal your information in an effort to hack your account. 

Reach out to our account recovery agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when you get the chance to make sure your account is still safe and secure.
